ojc.ahni.transcriber

Class HyperNEATTranscriberGridNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ojc.ahni.transcriber.HyperNEATTranscriber
      • ojc.ahni.transcriber.HyperNEATTranscriberGridNet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transcriber, Configurable

    public class HyperNEATTranscriberGridNet
extends HyperNEATTranscriber
    Constructs a GridNet neural network from a chromosome using the hypercube (from HyperNEAT) encoding scheme. An ActivatorTranscriber should be used to construct an instance of this class. To transcribe the neural network from a Chromosome a connective pattern producing network (CPPN) is created from the Chromosome, and then this is "queried" to determine the weight of each connection in the neural network. The CPPN is an AnjiNet.
    Author:
    Oliver Coleman
